name: Country Star's First Chart Toppers Quiz | Music | 25 Questions

questions.text:
Vince Gill?

Which song was his very first chart topper on the Billboard Country Chart?
questions.explanation:
I Still Believe in You.

	Vince did not hit the top until his 21st release.

questions.text:
Kenny Rogers:

Which song was his very first chart topper on the Billboard Country Chart?
questions.explanation:
Lucille.

	Kenny Rogers hit the top with his 4th release.

questions.text:
Keith Whitley?

Which song was his very first chart topper on the Billboard Country Chart?
options: When You Say Nothing At All
I Wonder Do You Think of Me
questions.explanation:
Don't Close Your Eyes.

	Keith Whitley hit the top with his 7th release.

questions.text:
Alabama?

Which song was their very first chart topper on the Billboard Country Chart?
questions.explanation:
Tennessee River.

	Alabama hit the top with their 3rd release.

questions.text:
Toby Keith?

Which song was his very first chart topper on the Billboard Country Chart?
questions.explanation:
Should've Been a Cowboy.

	Toby Keith went all the way to the top with his first release.

questions.text:
Willie Nelson?

Which song was his very first chart topper on the Billboard Country Chart?
questions.correct: Blue Eyes Crying in the Rain
questions.explanation:
Blue Eyes Crying in the Rain.

	It took Willie Nelson 16 songs before he topped the chart.

questions.text:
Martina McBride?

Which song was her very first chart topper on the Billboard Country Chart?
options: Safe in the Arms of Love
questions.explanation:
Wild Angels.

	Martina McBride took 7 songs to reach the top.

questions.text:
Collin Raye?

Which song was his very first chart topper on the Billboard Country Chart?
questions.explanation:
Love, Me.

	Collin Raye hit the top with his 2nd single.

questions.text:
George Strait?

Which song was his very first chart topper on the Billboard Country Chart?
options: Does Fort Worth Ever Cross Your Mind
questions.explanation:
Fool Hearted Memory.

	George Strait hit the top with his 4th single. George Strait has had a single on the charts every week from 1981 until 2002 (still going as of June 8th).

questions.text:
Trisha Yearwood?

Which song was her very first chart topper on the Billboard Country Chart?
questions.correct: She's in Love With the Boy
questions.explanation:
She's in Love With the Boy.

	Trisha Yearwood went all the way to the top with her first single.

questions.text:
John Berry?

Which song was his very first chart topper on the Billboard Country Chart?
questions.explanation:
Your Love Amazes Me.

	John Berry hit the top with his 2nd single.

questions.text:
Clint Black?

Which song was his very first chart topper on the Billboard Country Chart?
questions.explanation:
Better Man.

	Clint Black hit the top with his first 4 singles but 'Better Man' was first.

questions.text:
Brooks and Dunn?

Which song was their very first chart topper on the Billboard Country Chart?
questions.explanation:
Brand New Man.

	Brooks and Dunn also hit the top with their first 4 single but 'Brand New Man' was the first. When they first came out a lot of radio stations thought it was a duet between Garth Brooks and Holly Dunn, probably helped them to get noticed and the rest is history.

questions.text:
Garth Brooks?

Which song was his very first chart topper on the Billboard Country Chart?
questions.explanation:
If Tomorrow Never Comes.

	Garth Brooks hit the top with his 2nd single.

questions.text:
Mary-Chapin Carpenter?

Which song was her very first chart topper on the Billboard Country Chart?
options: Down at the Twist and Shout
questions.explanation:
Shut Up and Kiss Me.

	It Took Mary-Chapin Carpenter 16 singles to hit the top.

questions.text:
Johnny Cash?

Which song was his very first chart topper on the Billboard Country Chart?
questions.explanation:
I Walk the Line.

	Johnny Cash hit the top with his 4th single.

questions.text:
Mark Chesnutt?

Which song was his very first chart topper on the Billboard Country Chart?
questions.explanation:
Brother Jukebox.

	Marh Chesnutt hit the top with his 2nd single.

questions.text:
Diamond Rio?

Which song was their very first chart topper on the Billboard Country Chart?
questions.explanation:
Meet in the Middle.

	Diamond Rio hit the top with their first single.

questions.text:
Reba McEntire?

Which song was her very first chart topper on the Billboard Country Chart?
questions.explanation:
Can't Even Get the Blues.

	It took Reba McEntire 14 singles before she reached the top.

questions.text:
Tim McGraw?

Which song was his very first chart topper on the Billboard Country Chart?
questions.explanation:
Don't Take the Girl.

	Tim McGraw hit the top with this single.

questions.text:
John Michael Montgomery?

Which song was his very first chart topper on the Billboard Country Chart?
questions.correct: I Love the Way You Love Me
questions.explanation:
I Love the Way You Love Me.

	It took John Michael Montgomery 2 songs to get to the top.

questions.text:
Faith Hill?

Which song was her very first chart topper on the Billboard Country Chart?
questions.explanation:
Wild One.

	Faith Hill went to the top with her first single.

questions.text:
Alan Jackson:

Which song was his very first chart topper on the Billboard Country Chart?
questions.correct: I'd Love You All Over Again
questions.explanation:
I'd Love You All Over Again.

	It took Alan Jackson 4 singles before hitting the top.

questions.text:
George Jones?

Which song was his very first chart topper on the Billboard Country Chart?
questions.explanation:
White Lightning.

	13 was a lucky number for George Jones since it took that many singles before he hit the top.

questions.text:
Sawyer Brown?

Which song was their very first chart topper on the Billboard Country Chart?
questions.explanation:
Step That Step.

	It took Sawyer Brown 2 songs to reach the top. They were the first winner on 'Star Search' for groups.
